Package org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.model

Class Account

java.lang.Object
org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.model.Account
@Entity public class Account extends Object
Represents a bank account that has multiple balances for different account types and an associated card.

The Account class contains information about the account's unique identifier, account number, a set of balances for different types of expenses, and an associated card.

The class uses annotations from various libraries to define its persistence and serialization behavior:

  • @Entity - Marks this class as a JPA entity.
  • @Table - Specifies the table name in the database.
  • @Id and @GeneratedValue - Define the primary key and its generation strategy.
  • @Schema - Provides metadata for API documentation purposes.
  • @JsonProperty and @JsonIgnore - Define JSON serialization and deserialization behavior.
  • @OneToMany and @OneToOne - Specify relationships between entities.

See Also:

  • Field Details

    • accountId

      private Long accountId
      The unique identifier of the account.

      This is an auto-generated value used to uniquely identify an account in the database.

    • accountNumber

      private String accountNumber
      The account number of this bank account.

      This is a string representing the account number. It is used for identifying the account in transactions.

    • balances

      private Set<Balance> balances
      A set of balances associated with different types of expenses for this account.

      This collection contains Balance objects, each representing a different type of balance (e.g., FOOD, MEAL, CASH).

    • card

      private Card card
      The card associated with this bank account.

      This represents a single Card object related to the account, including details such as card number, expiration date, etc.
